Agent Productivity.name: Quick Templates
Agent Productivity.description: Pre-filled issue templates for common problems (printer, network, password reset).
Agent Productivity.example: Select 'Printer Issues' → Auto-fills device info fields and common symptoms.

Agent Productivity.name: Command Copy Buttons
Agent Productivity.description: One-click copy for PowerShell/CMD commands and registry edits in resolution steps.
Agent Productivity.example: Copy: sfc /scannow or ipconfig /flushdns with tooltip showing what it does.

Agent Productivity.name: Ticket Export
Agent Productivity.description: Export diagnosis as ServiceNow/Jira-ready ticket with all fields populated.
Agent Productivity.example: Generate ticket: Title, Description, Resolution Steps, Work Notes, Priority.

Agent Productivity.name: Bulk Diagnosis
Agent Productivity.description: Upload CSV of similar issues and get batch troubleshooting results.
Agent Productivity.example: Upload 50 'Teams audio issues' → Get resolution matrix for all.

Agent Productivity.name: Agent Shortcuts
Agent Productivity.description: Keyboard shortcuts for common actions (Ctrl+Enter to submit, Ctrl+C for steps).
Agent Productivity.example: Alt+1 = Copy resolution steps, Alt+2 = Copy work note, Esc = Clear form.

Agent Productivity.name: Recent Issues Cache
Agent Productivity.description: Quick access to last 10 diagnosed issues for pattern recognition.
Agent Productivity.example: Today: 8 Teams audio issues → Suggest checking Windows audio drivers first.

Intelligence.name: OS-Specific Fixes
Intelligence.description: Detect Windows/macOS/Linux from device info and provide tailored resolution steps.
Intelligence.example: Windows 11 → Use Settings app paths, macOS → System Preferences navigation.

Intelligence.name: Confidence Calibration
Intelligence.description: Learn from agent feedback to improve confidence scoring accuracy.
Intelligence.example: Agent marks 85% confidence solution as 'didn't work' → Adjust future similar cases.

Intelligence.name: Smart Escalation
Intelligence.description: Predict escalation likelihood based on issue complexity and user skill level.
Intelligence.example: Complex AD issue + Junior agent → 90% escalation probability → Pre-alert L2.

Intelligence.name: Pattern Detection
Intelligence.description: Identify trending issues across the organization for proactive alerts.
Intelligence.example: 15 VPN issues in 2 hours → Alert: Possible network outage, check infrastructure.

Intelligence.name: Solution Validation
Intelligence.description: Cross-reference proposed solutions with recent successful resolutions.
Intelligence.example: Proposed fix matches 3 successful resolutions from last week → Confidence +15%.

Intelligence.name: Multi-Language Support
Intelligence.description: Generate resolutions in agent's preferred language for global teams.
Intelligence.example: Spanish agent → Resolution steps in Spanish, technical terms in English.

UI_UX.name: Advanced Search
UI_UX.description: Search through previous diagnoses with filters (date, confidence, issue type).
UI_UX.example: Find all 'printer' issues from 'last week' with 'confidence > 80%'.

UI_UX.name: Agent Dashboard
UI_UX.description: Personal stats showing resolution rate, average time, trending issues.
UI_UX.example: Today: 12 resolved, 2 escalated, 8.5min avg time, trending: Teams issues.

UI_UX.name: Progressive Disclosure
UI_UX.description: Show basic form first, reveal advanced fields only when needed.
UI_UX.example: Start with Issue + Symptoms, expand to Device Info if confidence < 70%.

UI_UX.name: Mobile Responsive
UI_UX.description: Full functionality on tablets and phones for field agents.
UI_UX.example: Technician at user's desk can run diagnosis on tablet while troubleshooting.

UI_UX.name: Voice Input
UI_UX.description: Speak symptoms and issue details instead of typing.
UI_UX.example: Hold mic button: 'User can't print to HP LaserJet, getting error code 49'.

UI_UX.name: Split View Mode
UI_UX.description: Show form and results side-by-side on wide screens.
UI_UX.example: Left: Issue form, Right: Live diagnosis results as you type.

Business Value.name: Resolution Analytics
Business Value.description: Management dashboard with resolution rates, escalation trends, agent performance.
Business Value.example: 95% printer issues resolved at L1, 23% Teams issues escalated → Focus training.

Business Value.name: Cost Tracking
Business Value.description: Calculate time saved vs traditional troubleshooting and escalation costs.
Business Value.example: Fixie saved 120 hours this month → $3,600 labor cost reduction.

Business Value.name: Compliance Logging
Business Value.description: Audit trail of all actions for ITIL/ISO compliance requirements.
Business Value.example: Who diagnosed what, when, resolution taken, outcome → Full audit log.

Business Value.name: SLA Tracking
Business Value.description: Monitor resolution times against SLA commitments.
Business Value.example: P1 issues: 95% resolved within 15min SLA, P2: 87% within 1hr SLA.

Business Value.name: Knowledge Mining
Business Value.description: Extract successful patterns to build organizational knowledge base.
Business Value.example: Top 10 Windows 11 fixes that work 90%+ of time → KB article auto-draft.

Business Value.name: Client Reporting
Business Value.description: Generate monthly reports for outsourcing clients showing service quality.
Business Value.example: Accenture Report: 1,247 issues resolved, 94% success rate, 6.2min avg time.

Future_Proof.name: Slack/Teams Bot
Future_Proof.description: Use Fixie directly in chat apps with slash commands.
Future_Proof.example: /fixie printer not working → Get diagnosis in chat thread.

Future_Proof.name: Self-Service Portal
Future_Proof.description: End users can run basic diagnosis before contacting support.
Future_Proof.example: Employee portal: 'My headset isn't working' → Get 3 self-help steps.

Future_Proof.name: API Integration
Future_Proof.description: Connect with ServiceNow, Jira, Zendesk for automatic ticket creation.
Future_Proof.example: Fixie diagnosis → Auto-create ServiceNow incident with all details filled.

Future_Proof.name: AR Guidance
Future_Proof.description: Augmented reality overlays for complex hardware troubleshooting.
Future_Proof.example: Point phone at router → AR shows which cables to check and LED meanings.

Future_Proof.name: Predictive Maintenance
Future_Proof.description: Analyze device data to predict failures before they happen.
Future_Proof.example: Printer usage patterns → 'Replace toner in 3 days' alert.

Future_Proof.name: Multi-Tenant SaaS
Future_Proof.description: White-label solution for different outsourcing companies.
Future_Proof.example: Wipro branding, TCS custom fields, Accenture compliance rules → Same core.
